settings.title: Your Natural Hair Journey. Made Simpler
settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title:
“We started 4U to take the guesswork out of curl care.<br class="hide-mobile">  
Our job is to make your natural hair journey truly your own.”
Our Fabulous Founder
settings.subtitle: “I’m so proud to offer a line of natural hair care that’s science-backed, nature-made, and totally clean for your curls, health, and the environment.”

settings.title: Hair Care is a Family Affair
settings.subtitle: Everyone deserves access to clean hair care—especially our kids. That’s why our products have ingredients you can pronounce. 4U is 100% safe for the entire family.

settings.title: Celebrate Your Curls
settings.subtitle: Curls should be celebrated. Juicy curls, soft curls, coily curls, bouncy curls, shiny curls, we love all curls! Curly hair deserves the best sustainable ingredients.

settings.title: Our Belief
settings.text:
It’s just hair. But it's your hair.
So for once, we’re not going to tell you what to do with it. We won’t tell you that you’ve gotta wear it straight and long. That you have to have slicked edges to feel professional. Or that you’ve gotta cut it all off to start again. It’s 4U.

4U to do what you want. 4U to do what makes you feel good. 4U, your lifestyle, and your journey. That’s why we created 4U by Tia.

Tia teamed up with the best, because she knows you deserve cleaner products at a better price. Together, we turned to nature to craft the most effective products for natural hair, In hopes that her journey inspires yours.

The journey to loving your natural hair for what it is, and what it can be: Healthy, strong, and uniquely yours.

4U by Tia. Your natural hair journey, made simpler.
